plot outline: This socially relevant saga traces the trials in the life a young boy who is reputed to be a notorious prankster at school. What events force him to run away and embark on a journey of self-discovery and who is responsible for his suffering?
title: Haaro Hakki
plot: This socially relevant saga traces the trials in the life a young boy who is reputed to be a notorious prankster at school. What events force him to run away and embark on a journey of self-discovery and who is responsible for his suffering?::Shrinivas G. Kulkarni
